title: we can do this all day

replies.msg:
It the popo is still like this, then we play with the police.

All organization, social groups in schools, universities, or else. All groups apply the permission of the social acitivities with more than 30 people.
The purpose for this is causing the police getting a lot of work to do and burn out. On the other hand, expose this to the world and cause they down grade the international status of Hong Kong which is the China government most worry. Hong Kong goes down, the economy of China will go down which can cause changes in China and make impact to communist government.

We cannot fight with them without weapons, but we can consume their energy and resources, make them exhausted in dealing with that.

See who can live longer in this surving war！
